name: Shoot Shoot!
description:
Shoot Shoot!
 Is a competitive local multiplayer prototype where the game is out of the screen too.


Here is an example! 
If the game says "DON'T SHOOT BUT KILL YOUR OPONENT" you can grab the controller and use his/her  joystick to throw your oponent out of the ring.
 Or maybe throw the controller through the window ( not recomended ).



YOU CAN ONLY PLAY THIS GAME WITH A CONTROLLER (Only xbox controllers tested)


Game done by Aarón Asensio
Thanks for the help with some parts to Miguel Sanchez and Edu Cueto
